ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.PawnSkil.label: Building allowance, part 1
ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.PawnSkil.description: A set of tips for the optimal use of resources in the construction of buildings. Allows you to cheat at some points in order to save some resources.

ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.PawnSkil.label: Building allowance, part 2
ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.PawnSkil.description: A list of object building tweaks that can be used to build much more practical structures. Increases the base quality of buildings.

ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.PawnSkil.label: Handling fire
ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.PawnSkil.description: Notes and rules for dealing with fire. Allows you to put out the fire much faster.

ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.PawnSkil.label: Actor skill
ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.PawnSkil.description: The ability to choose words in any situation. Allows you to raise the relationship with the selected pawn (select a colonist and right-click on the desired pawn)

ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.PawnSkil.label: Psychological impact
ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.PawnSkil.description: A set of rules for competent communication with people with mental disorders. Allows you to calm the downhearted person. Allows you to calm down a pawn in mental break (select a colonist and right-click on the desired pawn)

ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.PawnSkil.label: Meteorology
ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.PawnSkil.description: Observational data on the weather can predict its change, albeit not accurately.

ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.PawnSkil.label: Fundamentals of Geology
ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.PawnSkil.description: Skills in the field of geology allow you to determine the amount of ore. When mining any ore, there is a chance to find out the location of all the ore from the vein and the ore around.

ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.PawnSkil.label: Efficient harvest
ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.PawnSkil.description: Knowledge in the field of plant cycles allows you to get the best result at the harvest stage.
